creator: eric.molitor@achievehealthcare.com
text:
Not using cmp so we dont have a jbosscmp-jdbc.xml file yet ejbjar requires me 
to create one. This was not a problem with 1.5.4's ejbjar task. (setting cmp to 
1.0 doesn't help either. How about cmp="none" for people not using cmp)
I changed the log message from a WARNING to a VERBOSE.
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
